name: PatchUp (Needlehead)
description:
PatchUp is a unique platformer game mixed with fighting elements, currently being made by 5 students for a bachelor project.

 Set in a toy world, you play as Patch - a ragdoll with a one-armed disability - who encounters an adventure to save the toy princess, who has been split into pieces and kidnapped by enemies of the throne. With the help of clever strategy and Patch's courageous spirit, fight your way through enemies and obstacles to patch up the princess and restore peace to the toy world!

Team members

The team consists of 2 artists and 3 programmers
Artists :
Elinor S. Karlsen
Sebastian Miranda

Programmers:
Sander B. Sørensen
Are B. Aamodt
Petter S. Rørtveit

Note: the menus are still under construction but the most important are the controls, start and quit game. In-game you can access the pause menu by  pressing the "P" button on your keyboard.
